data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pugliese, Adriana, Pombal, José P., Sazima, Ivan (2004): A new species of Scinax (Anura: Hylidae) from rocky montane fields of the Serra do Cipó, Southeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 688: 1-15, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.158103
